content: I'm thinking of buying a new laptop soon, my current one is about three years old and it's starting to slow down. I've been eyeing the new MacBook Air with the M1 chip, but it's a bit pricey. Do you have any recommendations or know when the next sale event might be? By the way, I've been enjoying my new Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra, and I also got a wireless charging pad from Belkin on Amazon, which cost around $25, it's been working great for charging my phone every night.
